M

main(String[]) - Static method in class logic.ConsoleController
This function initializes a predefined Game with two levels that are playable.
Map - Class in logic
This class is the text based storage for the in game characters/objects locations on the current Game being played.
Map() - Constructor for class logic.Map
Creates a Map with predefined size, using default Guard and default number of ogres.
Map(int) - Constructor for class logic.Map
Creates a default Map initialized on a specific level.
Map(GuardPersonality, int) - Constructor for class logic.Map
Creates a default Map initialized on a specific level with given guardPersonality Guard.
Map(int, int) - Constructor for class logic.Map
Creates a default Map initialized on a specific level with given ogreNumber number of ogres.
Map(char[][], boolean, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class logic.Map
Creates a custom Map using newMap as reference for initial objects/characters positioning.
Map(int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class logic.Map
Creates a empty custom Map with specified size.
moveDown() - Method in class logic.Character
Set this Character position to one unit under the current position.
moveDown() - Method in class logic.Weapon
Set this Weapon position to one unit under the current position.
moveLeft() - Method in class logic.Character
Set this Character position to one unit to the left of the current position.
moveLeft() - Method in class logic.Weapon
Set this Weapon position to one unit to the left of the current position.
moveRight() - Method in class logic.Character
Set this Character position to one unit to the right of the current position.
moveRight() - Method in class logic.Weapon
Set this Weapon position to one unit to the right of the current position.
moveUp() - Method in class logic.Character
Set this Character position to one unit above the current position.
moveUp() - Method in class logic.Weapon
Set this Weapon position to one unit above the current position.
